text: Nicola Furlong is a Canadian novelist who lives in Sidney, British Columbia.Author's Den ==Works== *Teed Off! - 1996 *A Hemorrhaging of Souls - 1998 *The Nervous Nephew - 2000 *The Angel's Secret - 2001 *The Unsuitable Suitor - 2001 *No Safe Arbor - 2001 ==References== Category:Canadian women novelists Category:Living people Category:20th-century Canadian novelists Category:21st-century Canadian novelists Category:Writers from British Columbia Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:20th-century Canadian women writers Category:21st-century Canadian women writers
title: Nicola Furlong
